title: Syracuse Researchers Melt Rock, Grill A Steak Over Magma
teaser: Researchers at the university built a furnace that can melt rock, then had a cookout. Chefs placed a ribeye on a grill over the 2,100-degree magma. Seconds later, a very charred, medium rare steak.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
